itemLabel: Audrey Callaghan, Baroness Callaghan of Cardiff
itemDescription: British councillor, wife of James Callaghan

wikipedia_page.main: Audrey Elizabeth Callaghan, Baroness Callaghan of Cardiff (née Moulton; 28 July 1915 – 15 March 2005) was the wife of British Labour prime minister James Callaghan. She served as a Labour councillor and later became a campaigner and fundraiser for children's health and welfare.
